description:
We support the NEW udemy Price guidelines for all Students with this new Coupon Code: 50%Off 

In this tightly edited 10-video set, 10 key skills & techniques are taught to new and more experienced Speakers & Presenters. It delivers maximum information in a mobile-friendly package. It's based on the professional practices & principles I've learned working as an Actor, Presenter, & Narrator in America & Japan plus 5 years coaching corporate clients & teaching college communication classes.

Each less than 5-minute video, introduces, demonstrates, & explains the use of one fundamental Speaking/Presenting skill or technique.

Videos can be viewed in any order. Video #10 the concluding video, includes a Bonus, and is designed to be viewed last.

All videos cross-reference information within the set. This results in your solid, unified Presentation and resulting “Performance".

You will appreciate this portable, quick-reference Training for it's clarity of instruction, demonstration of delivery, and focus on solutions.
title: 10-Best Tips for Global Speakers & Presenters
